About

About Digvijay Bhakuni

J2EE Developer having 3+ year of exhaustive experience developing enterprise level applications, web API, micro-services with Java Enterprise Edition Platform also experience in developing full-stack web app with Spring Platform. Proficient in Java with agility to learn new technology and natural tendency to implement code with good practices.

Role and responsibility handled, creation of low level design documents, logic development and implementation of code, writing unit test cases, code performance analysis, impact analysis, unit testing, bug analysis, communication with service provider, handing integration of 3rd party API, developing mirco-service from scratch, individually handed service project, exploring new technologies, creating POC and documentation of API created.

About

DGStack is web blog by digvijay bhakuni. This blog is about computer programming tips and trick. And some short tutorial and gettings started post about the framework, libriay, api and much more. The blog target mostly open source stuff like java, j2ee, nodeJs, angularJs, spring, struts, mongodb, mean, etc
